# Library Setup
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
library(tidytext)
```

# Data Importing
```{r tidy=TRUE}
ecommerce <- read.csv('ecommerce_dataset_10000.csv')

head(ecommerce)
```

# Data Cleaning
```{r}
ecommerce <- ecommerce %>%
  mutate(
    order_year = year(ymd(order_date))
  )
summary(ecommerce$order_year)
```
